replies.content: If you're still new, I'd recommend focusing on the fundamentals of HTML, CSS, and JS before considering React. It's very tempting to jump ahead but lay a solid foundation first.
I couldn't agree more with this. Everything moves so fast and it always seems like everyone knows the newest library/framework. But the  fundamentals are what stay constant.
